trans-unit.source: Applicability of Functional Transformation (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 功能转换 (Visual Basic 中) 的适用性 |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: Applicability of Functional Transformation (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 功能转换 (Visual Basic 中) 的适用性

trans-unit.source: Pure functional transformations are applicable in a wide variety of situations.
trans-unit.target: 纯函数转换适用于多种情况。

trans-unit.source: The functional transformation approach is ideally suited for querying and manipulating structured data; therefore it fits well with LINQ technologies.
trans-unit.target: 函数转换方法最适合查询和操作结构化数据，因此它非常适合 LINQ 技术。

trans-unit.source: However, functional transformation has a much wider applicability than use with LINQ.
trans-unit.target: 但函数转换比使用 LINQ 具有更广泛的适用性。

trans-unit.source: Any process where the main focus is on transforming data from one form to another should probably be considered as a candidate for functional transformation.
trans-unit.target: 任何侧重于将数据从一种形式转换为另一种形式的进程都可以考虑作为函数转换的候选项。

trans-unit.source: This approach is applicable to many problems that might not appear at first glance to be a candidate.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适用于乍看可能不是候选项的许多问题。

trans-unit.source: Used in conjunction with or separately from LINQ, functional transformation should be considered for the following areas:
trans-unit.target: 在独立或与 LINQ 一起使用时，应考虑对以下方面使用函数转换：

trans-unit.source: XML-based documents.
trans-unit.target: 基于 XML 的文档。

trans-unit.source: Well-formed data of any XML dialect can be easily manipulated through functional transformation.
trans-unit.target: 使用任何 XML 方言的格式良好的数据均可以通过函数转换容易地操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Functional Transformation of XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/functional-transformation-of-xml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能 XML 转换 (Visual Basic 中)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/functional-transformation-of-xml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Other structured file formats.
trans-unit.target: 其他结构化文件格式。

trans-unit.source: From Windows.ini files to plain text documents, most files have some structure that lends itself to analysis and transformation.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows.ini 文件到纯文本文档，多数文件都有适于本身进行分析和转换的结构。

trans-unit.source: Data streaming protocols.
trans-unit.target: 数据流协议。

trans-unit.source: Encoding data into and decoding data from communication protocols can often be represented by a simple functional transform.
trans-unit.target: 将数据编码为通信协议和从通信协议解码数据通常可以由简单的函数转换来表示。

trans-unit.source: RDBMS and OODBMS data.
trans-unit.target: RDBMS 和 OODBMS 数据。

trans-unit.source: Relational and object-oriented databases, just like XML, are widely-used structured data sources.
trans-unit.target: 关系数据库和面向对象的数据库和 XML 一样，是广泛使用的结构化数据源。

trans-unit.source: Mathematic, statistic, and science solutions.
trans-unit.target: 数学、统计和科学解决方案。

trans-unit.source: These fields tend to manipulate large data sets to assist the user in visualizing, estimating, or actually solving non-trivial problems.
trans-unit.target: 这些字段适用于操作大型数据集，以帮助用户处理可视化、评估或实际解决重要问题。

trans-unit.source: As described in [Refactoring Into Pure Functions (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/refactoring-into-pure-functions.md), using pure functions is an example of functional programming.
trans-unit.target: 如中所述[重构到纯函数 (Visual Basic 中)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/refactoring-into-pure-functions.md)，使用纯函数是函数式编程的一个示例。

trans-unit.source: In additional to their immediate benefits, using pure functions provides valuable experience in thinking about problems from a functional transformation perspective.
trans-unit.target: 除了直接好处外，使用纯函数还可对从函数转换角度考虑问题提供宝贵的经验。

trans-unit.source: This approach can also have major impact on program and class design.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法也可能对程序和类设计产生重要影响。

trans-unit.source: This is especially true when a problem lends itself to a data transformation solution as described above.
trans-unit.target: 当问题本身适于数据转换解决方案（如上所述）时更是如此。

trans-unit.source: Although they are beyond the scope of this tutorial, designs that are influenced by the functional transformation perspective tend to center on processes more than on objects as actors, and the resulting solution tends to be implemented as series of large-scale transformations, rather than individual object state changes.
trans-unit.target: 虽然受函数转换透视影响的设计不在本教程的范围内，但在以进程为中心作为操作者和以对象为中心作为操作者之间，他们更倾向于前者，生成的解决方案倾向于以一系列大规模转换而不是单独的对象状态更改的形式实现。

trans-unit.source: Again, remember that Visual Basic supports both imperative and functional approaches, so the best design for your application might incorporate elements of both.
trans-unit.target: 同样请注意 Visual Basic 支持命令性和功能性方法，因此您的应用程序的最佳设计可能需要合并这两个元素。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅
